root.Summary: 1: Grinev VV, Migas AA, Kirsanava AD, Mishkova OA, Siomava N, Ramanouskaya TV,Vaitsiankova AV, Ilyushonak IM, Nazarov PV, Vallar L, Aleinikova OV.
